trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface for representing and editing the values the Windows Workflow Foundation types in an object browser associated with a workflow designer.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class allows users to open object browsers associated with any workflow designer and view all types and members that reside in the Windows Workflow Foundation namespaces.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeBrowserEditor"></xref> class.
Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeBrowserEditor.GetEditStyle*>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that the editor can use to obtain services.
The new value of the object.
typeDescriptorContext or serviceProvider contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
<xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService*> returns a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>) when it attempts to obtain the type provider.
Returns the editor style used by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeBrowserEditor.EditValue*> method.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> value that indicates the style of editor used by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.TypeBrowserEditor.EditValue*>.
Unless overridden by an inheriting class, this method returns <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref>.
